title: 崩溃啊
author: Zai_Zai12345678
txt_content:
崩溃报告：

WARNING: coremods are present:

Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

replies.author: 咕
replies.txt_content:
GalacticraftCore 的问题
看报错是材质包的分辨率过高，换个低一些的

replies.author: Zai_Zai12345678
replies.txt_content:
Italiangun 发表于 2018-1-29 12:04
GalacticraftCore 的问题
看报错是材质包的分辨率过高，换个低一些的
怎么换低一点的呢？

replies.author: Zai_Zai12345678
replies.txt_content:
Italiangun 发表于 2018-1-29 12:04
GalacticraftCore 的问题
看报错是材质包的分辨率过高，换个低一些的
还有   那个Inventory Tweaks为什么也在报告里
有什么问题吗

replies.author: Zai_Zai12345678
replies.txt_content:
Italiangun 发表于 2018-1-29 12:05
补充：或者试着安装optifine
http://optifine.net/adloadx?f=OptiFine_1.12.2_HD_U_C8.jar
不好使啊 
还是崩溃
